capabilities.name: list_tables
capabilities.description: Lists tables accessible to the configured database user.

capabilities.name: get_table_schema
capabilities.description: Gets the schema (column names and data types) for a specific table.

capabilities.name: fetch_table_data
capabilities.description: Fetches data rows from a specified table.

capabilities.name: execute_query
capabilities.description: Executes an arbitrary SQL query. Use with caution, primarily for SELECT statements.

capabilities.name: get_all_schemas
capabilities.description: Fetches the schema (column names and data types) for all accessible tables.
